options.content:
# Openstack dashboard: $juju_model

* openstack data is cached, currently refreshed every 5 minutes
* The VM creation / teardown graph doesn't show the values for the builders in scalingstacks because they happen a lot faster than our scrape interval
* "Free IPs" are not owned by any tenant and available for allocation
* "Unused IPs" are owned by a tenant but not currently associated with an instance

targets.expr:
label_replace(sum by (dns_name, juju_unit)(disk_used{path=~".*nova/instances.*|.*var.*",juju_unit=~".*nova-compute.*"})/sum by (dns_name, juju_unit)(disk_total{path=~".*nova/instances.*|.*var.*",
juju_unit=~".*nova-compute.*"}) * 100, "short_hostname", "$1", "dns_name", "([^\\.]*)\\..*") and on (dns_name)label_replace(hypervisor_running_vms{aggregate=~"$aggregate"}, "dns_name", "$1", "hypervisor_hostname", "(.*)")

label_replace(sum by (dns_name)(rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_receive_bytes_total[1m])) + sum by (dns_name)(rate(libvirt_domain_interface_stats_transmit_bytes_total[1m])), "short_hostname", "$1", "dns_name", "([^\\.]*)\\..*") and on (dns_name)label_replace(hypervisor_running_vms{aggregate=~"$aggregate"}, "dns_name", "$1", "hypervisor_hostname", "(.*)")
